mpa.name: Meal Planner App
mpa.description: A quick project I did with vanilla HTML/CSS/JavaScript, based on a project by Brad Traversy (Traversy Media).  The point of this was just to get used to making API calls and then mass styling the results without the use of a library.

isp.name: InspireME
isp.description: This project took longer to complete, as it was my first full-fledge full stack application.  It uses the full MERN stack, with an Atlas database and an Express server

qr.name: QuickRecipes
qr.description: This project was a simple little app that I created for my wife to be able to quickly add recipe URLs, such as what you'd find on Facebook, to an index. I wanted to see if I could implement a fullstack app in one day, and this was the result of that. Express backend, vanilla HTML/CSS/JS frontend.
